cause.description:
WESST seeks to promote the economic self-sufficiency of low-income, unemployed and underemployed women and minorities through self-employment by providing business training, technical assistance and access to capital.
1. Self-employment is an effective route out of poverty.
2. Small businesses strengthen community.
3. Financial literacy education provides individuals with the knowledge they need to attain economic self-sufficiency.
cause.mission: We help small businesses do BIG things
cause.name: WESST
